explains: n. 住院治疗；医院收容；住院保险（等于 hospitalization insurance）
wordGroup: hospitalization insurance n. 医疗保险

sentences.en: Occasionally hospitalization is required to combat dehydration.
sentences.cn: 治疗脱水有时需要住院。

sentences.en: The doctor advised hospitalization for the child.
Infection was the most frequent cause of hospitalization.
sentences.cn: 感染是最常见的住院原因。
